TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ScrollBar/ArrowButton extends System.Object

summary.span: 为滚动箭头的每种状态和方向提供 。

span.span: Provides objects for each state and direction of a scroll arrow.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性类返回为不同的状态和滚动箭头的方向。Each property of the class returns a for a different state and direction of a scroll arrow. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与返回的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 处理该窗体事件，并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1`方法从事件处理方法，传递`e`作为。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarArrowButton1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#65)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#65)]

value.span: ，它表示处于禁用状态的向下滚动箭头。

span.span: A that represents a downward-pointing scroll arrow in the disabled state.
